WorkflowInfo.Name: Free up disk space
WorkflowInfo.Description: Free up disk space on a list of servers
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="3" TableName="DiskCleanupReport" RowNumber="0" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="Server" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="AvailableSpaceBefore" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="CurrentAvailableSpace" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\ServersList.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"> <ns5:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns6:AddMemoryTableRow Selection="2" IsValid="True" x:Name="addMemoryTableRow1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%DiskCleanupReport%" RowNumber="" NumberOfRows="1" ResultSetName="DiskCleanupReport" Description="Add a memory table row." DisplayName="Add Row to Memory Table" TypeName="AddMemoryTableRow" /> <ns7:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns8:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%ServerName%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" VariableName="%DiskCleanupReport%" x:Name="setServerName" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns9:DiskSpace IsValid="True" x:Name="diskSpaceBefore" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" TypeName="DiskSpace" DisplayName="Get Disk Space" Path="c:" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Get the selected disk space information" HostId="-2" SelectedDeviceStatus="Available %" UserName="" /> <ns8:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%diskSpaceBefore%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" VariableName="%DiskCleanupReport%" x:Name="setSpaceBefore" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns10:DeleteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="deleteFile1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Delete File" Path="c:\temp\*.*" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Delete the selected file." HostId="-2" TypeName="DeleteFile" UserName="" /> <ns10:DeleteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="deleteFile2" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Delete File" Path="c:\windows\temp\*.*" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Delete the selected file." HostId="-2" TypeName="DeleteFile" UserName="" /> <ns11:FolderList Password="" TimeInSeconds="0" HostName="%ServerName%" x:Name="folderList1" DisplayName="List Folder" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TimeSelection="00:00:00" Path="c:\Windows" Filter="0" TypeName="FolderList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isRecursive="1" Condition="0" Timeout="00:05:00" UserName="" Description="List the contents of the specified folder." FilterSelection="False" MapDrive="True" /> <ns12:ResultSetFilter IsValid="True" x:Name="getFiles" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="ResultSet Filter" VariableName="%folderList1%" Description="Filter a Result Set" TypeName="ResultSetFilter" FilterStatement="Name LIKE '$%'" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%getHidden%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="getHidden" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns5:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns7:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="FolderPath" ColumnNumber="3" ResultSet="%getFiles%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="getFiles" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns13:DeleteFolder IsValid="True" x:Name="deleteFolder1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Delete Folder" Path="%FolderPath%" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Delete the selected folder." HostId="-2" TypeName="DeleteFolder" UserName="" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns9:DiskSpace IsValid="True" x:Name="diskSpaceAfter" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" TypeName="DiskSpace" DisplayName="Get Disk Space" Path="c:" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Get the selected disk space information" HostId="-2" SelectedDeviceStatus="Available %" UserName="" /> <ns8:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%diskSpaceAfter%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" VariableName="%DiskCleanupReport%" x:Name="setSpaceAfter" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns3:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%DiskCleanupReport%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /> <ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Disk space cleanup report" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 11.00.9600.16476"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">%convertToHTMLTable1% </BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of servers from an Excel file or a memory table which contains server names, and for each server checks if the current disk space exceeds the desired threshold. If it is, a pre-defined file is deleted and an email is being sent. You can also add a ?focal point? column for each server and use this process to quickly and easily notify the relevant person whenever a problem occurs, and add more file deletion activities to maintain your servers? free space.
